titleStmt.title: A faythfull admonition made by Iohn̄ Knox, vnto the professours of Gods truthe in England whereby thou mayest learne howe God wyll haue his Churche exercised with troubles, and how he defendeth it in the same.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

titleStmt.title: A faythfull admonition made by Iohn̄ Knox, vnto the professours of Gods truthe in England whereby thou mayest learne howe God wyll haue his Churche exercised with troubles, and how he defendeth it in the same.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

notesStmt.note: With some reference to Queen Mary's Spanish marriage.
The imprint (from colophon) is false; printed in Emden by Egidius van der Erve (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
